name: getDatabases
description: Gets a list of the databases on a server

name: getViewsAndFolders
description: Gets a list of the views and folders in a database

name: getViewFolderDesign
description: Gets the design for a view (or folder)

name: getViewFolderEntries
description: Gets a list of entries in a view (or folder)

queryParameters.name: count
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of entries. Defaults to 10.

queryParameters.name: entrycount
queryParameters.description: Include a Content-Range header in the response. Defaults to true.

queryParameters.name: searchmaxdocs
queryParameters.description: Limits the number of entries returned in a search.

queryParameters.name: sortcolumn
queryParameters.description: Name of column used to sort results.

queryParameters.name: keys
queryParameters.description: Get results starting at a specific key value. Combine this with the sortcolumn parameter.

queryParameters.name: keysexactmatch
queryParameters.description: Match keys exactly. Combine this with the keys parameter.

queryParameters.name: expandlevel
queryParameters.description: Return entries at the specified indent level or higher. Defaults to 0.

queryParameters.name: category
queryParameters.description: Return entries in the specified category.

queryParameters.name: parentid
queryParameters.description: Return children of the specified parent.

queryParameters.name: hidden
queryParameters.description: Emit hidden items (beginning with $). Defaults to false.

queryParameters.name: markRead
queryParameters.description: Update unread marks on the server. Defaults to true.

queryParameters.name: strongtype
queryParameters.description: Emits date/time items as strongly typed JSON objects. Defaults to false.

queryParameters.name: computewithform
queryParameters.description: Compute the document items with form-based forumlas. Combine with the form parameter. Defaults to false.

queryParameters.name: parentid
queryParameters.description: Create the new document as a response to the specified document.
